DOC.brief_summary: Hypotension does not occur with Maraviroc at a dose of 600 mg/day
DOC.brief_title: Study of Maraviroc (MVC) and Epzicom (ABC/3TC) Once-Daily in ART-Naive & First Switch Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A qualitative description of orthostatic hypotension in patients receiving once daily Maraviroc at 600 mg with Epzicom measured by a validated questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Epzicom Maraviroc once daily dosing Maraviroc with any other back bone
